explanation: Despite being empty late, the reviewer enjoyed the food, service, cocktails, and noted positive aspects like happy hour and patio, indicating a good experience overall.
The review gives a very strong positive endorsement, stating the crawfish etouffee is the best her friend from Louisiana has had outside her home state.
The food is described as 'good and filling' and a regular spot, but also as 'typical strip mall pizza,' suggesting a satisfactory but not outstanding experience.
The reviewer expresses extreme disappointment due to a massive overcharge for a simple fix, feeling misled and losing trust in the brand.
The reviewer 'loves this place,' ate there multiple times during a short stay, praised the food as 'amazing,' and recommends it as a 'must try.'
The hotel offers a good location, free parking and breakfast, and clean, spacious rooms. The only minor drawback was noise from neighbors, leading to an overall 'great choice' rating.
The reviewer 'loves' the top-quality seafood, praises specific dishes, notes good happy hour prices, and appreciates late-night food, despite a minor 'hit and miss' service.
The review uses highly enthusiastic terms like 'Awesome' and 'awesomer' to describe both ramen and boba tea, indicating a fantastic experience.
The reviewer describes it as a 'Great place' and 'one of my favorite places,' praising the 'awesome' food and 'generous portions.'
The reviewer had a very negative experience with the food, specifically the lack of meat, on multiple occasions and states they will not return.
The review highlights good food, efficient service for a large group, reasonable wait times, and a good value for the total bill.
The reviewer is highly enthusiastic, describing the place as 'great' multiple times, praising the atmosphere, accommodating staff, and excellent prices.
The phrase 'Air Jordan! need I say more?' strongly implies an iconic and excellent product or experience, warranting a top rating.
The reviewer considers it a 'go-to' place with great hours, competitive prices, and a good selection of specific items. The main drawback is the deli staff, which requires customers to be 'firm.'
The reviewer received outstanding assistance during an emergency, feeling 'very grateful' and committing to future referrals.
The burger was only 'okay,' and the reviewer was 'not impressed' with the overpriced beverages and average fries, recommending to skip most items.

While acknowledging 'amazing quality,' the reviewer found the store 'too fancy' for her taste, the registry department 'extremely small,' and service had a specific error, leading to a 'not impressed' conclusion.
This review is primarily informative, highlighting a useful 'petite' burger option for calorie-conscious diners, rather than a strong positive or negative overall review.
The reviewer uses highly positive descriptors like 'Great pizza' and 'awesome must have' for the appetizer.
The reviewer praises the airport for being 'quaint,' 'very convenient,' and exceptionally fast from landing to rental car.
The reviewer found the burger 'fantastic' on a repeat visit and noted an improvement in the fries, with only minor suggestions for drink cups and sizes.

The reviewer highly praises the 'really great cajun food,' excellent value, friendly staff, and states they've 'never had a bad dish' over 20 visits, calling it a 'gem' despite the casual casino atmosphere.
The reviewer describes a highly negative experience due to rude staff, overpriced services, uncomfortable heat, and malfunctioning equipment, stating they will not return.
The review highlights very helpful staff and a fantastic pool area, with rooms and banquet food being 'good' but not exceptional, and a minor issue with room noise.
The reviewer had a highly positive experience, praising the fresh, hot, and delicious food (especially onion rings and burger), friendly service, and plans to return.
The reviewer was 'fully satisfied' with perfectly cooked, flavorful food and a refreshing drink, considering it a 'good option' for a filling and affordable meal.
The review is a direct and strong complaint about prices being 'way too high.'
The reviewer's expectations were 'exceeded' due to good happy hour deals, a great value meal special with very good food options, and very fast, friendly service.
The reviewer notes key equipment is 'always out of service,' staff is 'strange,' and prices are higher than competitors, concluding with a 'meh' sentiment.
The reviewer describes an absolutely terrible service experience, with long waits, rude actions by the server, and no compensation, which overshadowed the 'fine' food.
The reviewer was 'very disappointed' with all dishes, describing them as bland, dry, and tasteless, and strongly advises others to 'go elsewhere.'
The reviewer expresses extreme frustration and annoyance with the confusing payment system and nozzle design, concluding with a strong declaration of 'never going back there again.'
The reviewer praises the pulled pork and beans as very good, with only minor feedback on the slaw, and states they 'will definitely go back.'
The reviewer describes it as the 'cutest place ever,' a favorite morning spot with 'good' and flavorful breakfast items, using an enthusiastic and quirky tone.
The reviewer states this is 'one of the cleanest and most efficient Subways I have EVER been to,' praising the friendly staff, fresh food, and overall tidiness.
The reviewer praises the shop's 'family vibe,' 'down to earth' tattooers who prioritize customers, and overall friendly atmosphere, highly recommending it.
The reviewer states these are 'Simply the best sandwiches I have ever tasted' and praises specific aspects of the food as 'perfect,' indicating an outstanding experience.

The reviewer 'really liked' the flavorful chicken and waffles, found other dishes good, and would 'definitely go back,' despite finding portions slightly small for the price and a minor issue with one dish.
The reviewer praised the 'Great BBQ,' calling the brisket and ribs 'delicious,' and recommended the root beer and beans, despite a dislike for cafeteria-style ordering and one unimpressive side.
The reviewer explicitly states they 'wasted 38 bucks' and will 'never again' return, indicating a completely unsatisfactory experience.
Despite good service, the reviewer found the food 'decidedly mediocre and way overpriced,' comparing nearly every dish unfavorably to competitors and feeling it was not worth the cost.

Despite excellent service, the reviewer found the food 'absolutely horrible' (especially the steak), the bread old, and the atmosphere cramped and noisy, leading to a strong declaration of being 'had it with this place.'

The reviewer uses heavy sarcasm to suggest the clientele and atmosphere are inappropriate ('To Catch A Predator,' 'Lolita'), criticizes the 'sloppy' drinks and decor, and offers very conditional and backhanded 'pluses.'
The reviewer recounts an extremely frustrating and confusing experience of getting lost due to unmarked trails and misleading expectations about the area, repeatedly cursing the location.
The reviewer praises the 'Great food,' calling specific dishes 'to die for,' along with wonderful and quick service and a welcoming atmosphere, highly recommending it despite the price.
The reviewer enthusiastically praises the 'friendly' and kind staff, 'food rocks' quality, excellent spice level, and considers it the 'best bargain' for spice lovers.
The reviewer describes a 'nice store' with good organization, non-pushy staff, and a quality selection of products, making them want to return despite slightly high prices without coupons.
The reviewer enthusiastically declares they had the 'ABSOLUTE BEST CRAB SALAD' and highly recommends the place, praising the freshness and taste.
The reviewer had a highly positive experience, finding the food 'divine,' rolls 'HUGE,' and prices 'absolutely fair for the quality,' and stated they 'will most definitely come back.'
The reviewer had an extremely negative experience with the taxi being significantly late and lost, causing them to miss a non-refundable class and lose money.
The reviewer describes multiple dishes as bad, greasy, and not worth it, concluding it's 'truly awful' and preferring a fast-food chain over it.
The reviewer states it's 'okay, not the best place in the world,' but would choose it over a similar competitor like Denny's, indicating a satisfactory but unremarkable experience.
The reviewer is highly enthusiastic about the 'neat' and unique animal-filled atmosphere, finding the food 'fairly decent' and overall experience thrilling for its novelty.
Despite being 'a bit shabby,' the reviewer is a long-time customer who praises the 'delicious' food, decent prices, friendly staff, and problem-solving ability, calling it 'a good place.'
The reviewer provides a detailed positive review, particularly praising the beer selection and service, with the food being decent ('nothing spectacular'), resulting in an overall good experience.
While praising the 'awesome' view and layout, the reviewer is turned off by the 'huge' price of drinks and lack of well options, stating changes are needed to entice a return.
The reviewer raves about the food ('Salmon melted in my mouth,' bread pudding 'so worth it'), combined with great atmosphere and good service, and states they would 'definitely go back.'
The reviewer expresses strong love for the 'super delicious and inexpensive' fro yo and 'can't wait to go back.'
The reviewer states they've 'never been disappointed' after trying everything on the menu, and praises the 'excellent' and friendly service.
The reviewer was 'disappointed' by increased prices, halved portions, and poor service, concluding they would seek better alternatives.
The reviewer had a negative experience due to the business failing to open on time despite posted hours, resulting in wasted time and a missed service.
The reviewer found the food 'way under seasoned' and disliked the 'store bought tortillas,' stating they do not plan on returning as there are better alternatives.

The reviewer describes it as a 'blast' for a specific type of experience (dive bar, large group), praising the atmosphere and efficient bar staff, despite acknowledging the facilities are 'a little beat.'
While a 'standard' Target, the reviewer expected more given its location and explicitly avoids it due to 'atrocious' traffic and parking, opting for other stores instead.

The reviewer praises the 'delicious dinner' and great value, stating it would be five stars if the dining room wasn't 'disgusting,' indicating a strong positive for food but a significant negative for cleanliness.
The reviewer was disappointed, finding the pizza 'lacking soul,' salads too salty/soggy, and gelato poor, stating they 'expect a lot more' despite it being better than a very low bar like Pizza Hut.
The reviewer had an 'excellent dinner,' praising the halibut as 'WONDERFUL' and the scalloped potatoes as 'the BEST,' and plans to make it a regular stop.
The reviewer declares it their 'Favorite Pho in the phoenix area so far,' praising the 'Great, tender meat' and friendly staff, indicating high satisfaction.
The reviewer 'wasn't impressed' with the food, specifically criticizing the store-bought tasting dressing and 'very very mushy' tomatoes.
The reviewer had a 'great time,' praising the 'so cool' outdoor bar, 'tasty' apps at 'low, low prices,' and 'awesome' service, and plans to return.
The reviewer rates it 3 stars specifically for a good veggie sandwich but notes significant issues with slow service due to understaffing.
The reviewer states the experience has 'gone DOWNHILL, big time' due to franchising, describing it as a 'disappointment' compared to its past.

The reviewer emphatically states 'it doesn't get any better than this,' praising the unique concept, 'good, tasty, and satisfying food,' and excellent customer service, with only a minor note about the small interior.
The reviewer describes it as a 'great local bar,' highlighting the 'cool' bartender, 'cheap prices,' 'awesome juke box,' and overall loving the place.
While the reviewer 'loved the atmosphere,' they found the NY strip steak 'not worth the price' and, despite great customer service, concluded they would 'not be eating here again.'
The reviewer had a 'terrific experience' with the 'quick and easy' donation process and praised the 'great people' and community benefit.
The reviewer experienced being 'double billed' on their debit card twice, finds it 'annoying,' and states they wouldn't go there at all if not for convenience.
The reviewer expresses strong enthusiasm, stating they 'love love' the cafe, finding the food 'amazing' and the atmosphere 'very cute and artsy.'
The reviewer praises the 'nice atmosphere,' unique salsa bar, and several 'excellent' or 'amazing' dishes, despite one dish being 'bland and flavorless,' and plans to 'definitely visit again.'
The reviewer praises the Stetson chopped salad and bread pudding as 'amazing,' highlights 'excellent' service, and notes a good selection of drinks, indicating a superb dining experience.
The reviewer uses strong positive words like 'Yum!', 'Delicious,' 'wonderful atmosphere,' and 'devine' for the food.
The reviewer found the panini generous and good, praised the 'very friendly and patient' staff, and called it a 'nice place' overall for sandwiches.

The reviewer found several dishes impressive and unique, especially the Pate Chaude, but criticized the 'bland' curries, 'basic' other items, and 'slooooooooow' service which resulted in a very long wait time.
The reviewer is a 'huge fan,' praising the conducive atmosphere for work, good coffee, friendly staff, and decor, leading to a declared 4-star rating.

While acknowledging better steaks exist, the reviewer emphasizes the 'classic,' 'cool,' and unique atmosphere as the primary draw, making it a highly valued experience despite the food only being 'pretty good.'
The reviewer describes it as a 'great dog park' with good amenities and a good crowd, with only minor, humorous complaints about other dogs/owners.
The reviewer declares it the 'best barber shop I've ever been to' and praises the 'top notch' attention to detail, indicating an exceptional experience.
The reviewer received a 'pretty decent' hand car wash, appreciated the non-pushy staff, found cheaper gas, and benefited from a senior discount, indicating a good value and experience.
The reviewer praises the 'home made fresh noodles' and gives a strong positive comparison to 'San Francisco china town food,' implying high quality.
The reviewer found an item here that a competitor didn't have, at a 'good price,' and recommends it as a valuable alternative.
The reviewer found it a 'great wine bar,' praised the food and wine as 'so good,' and enjoyed the cozy atmosphere.
The reviewer found the brunch 'average,' specifically criticized the 'extremely weak, bland and underseasoned' potatoes, and noted 'pretty slow' service, concluding it's a place to 'skip.'
The term 'Glorified Pei Wei' suggests it's an overpriced or overhyped version of a fast-casual chain, implying a negative value proposition.

The reviewer was 'pleasantly surprised' by the 'great Italian find,' praising the welcoming atmosphere, friendly staff, well-cooked and tasty food, complimentary drinks, and overall great experience, vowing to return.
The reviewer praises the charming atmosphere, good coffee, and especially the 'very nice staff,' which is highlighted as the 'most important factor' for return visits.
The reviewer 'could not have been more impressed,' finding the food 'amazing,' 'far above expectations,' 'huge and delicious,' and highly recommending it for its authenticity and good price.
The reviewer describes it as a 'hidden jewel' with great amenities like huge rooms and free breakfast/WIFI, explicitly stating the only reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is the 'really small' pool.
The reviewer praises the grocery store for always being 'clean and well stocked' with short wait times.

While one dish (gyro) was very poor and sent back, the reviewer found other food 'fantastic' and 'great,' appreciated the responsive service, and praised the beautiful location and view, ultimately recommending the restaurant.
The reviewer found the ice cream 'tasty' but gave it two stars due to the extremely high price for a small portion, calling it 'absolutely a fool parting with his money.'
